content: cushy comfy chemo cap materials one ball lion brand suede size j / 10 mm crochet hook round 1 chain 2 6 half_double_crochet in first chain slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet to end round round 2 chain 1 *half_double_crochet in front loop half_double_crochet in back loop of same stitch repeat from * around slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet to end round round 3 repeat round 2 round 4 chain 1 *half_double_crochet in front loop half_double_crochet in back loop of same stitch half_double_crochet in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet to end round round 5 chain 1 work even slip_stitch in first st to end round round 6 chain 1 *half_double_crochet in front loop half_double_crochet in back loop of same stitch half_double_crochet in next 2 st repeat from * around slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet to end round round 7 chain 1 work even slip_stitch in first st to end round repeat round 7 to desired size fasten_off weave in ends cushy comfy chemo cap © 2007 yvonne tate designsbyvon@hotmail com
